segment.phrase: Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu: nkhani ya Albertina Sisulu
Ku South Africa mu 1918, kunabadwa mwana wotchedwa Ntsiki. Inali nyengo yachisanu, ndipo mayi ake amamuimbira nyimbo pomwe amamutenthetsa. “Limba mtima, mwanawe. Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu!”

Ntsiki anakula wathanzi, koma mayi ake samakhala athanzi kawirikawiri. Ntsiki amathandizira kusamalira ang’ono ake. Anawaphunzitsa kuimba monga momwe mayi ake anachitira. “Limbani mtima, ananu. Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu!”
Agogo ake a Ntsiki amaweta mahatchi. Yapamtima pake inali Shishi, yokongola yakuda.
Ntsiki amadziwa bwino kukwera hatchi. Amakwera pahatchi nthawi zonse pokakumana ndi bambo ake akamachokera kumigodi.

Ntsiki atakwanitsa zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi anayamba sukulu. Aphunzitsi ake anamuuza kuti asankhe dzina latsopano, lachizungu. Ntsiki samadziwa chifukwa chimene amafunikira dzina latsopano, koma anasankha la ‘Albertina’.
Kuchokera pamenepo, amadziwika ndi dzina loti Albertina.
Albertina amaphonya maphunziro ena posamalira abale ake, koma anachita bwino pamaphunziro. Anakhala mtsogoleri wa ophunzira, iye analowa mpikisano wa thandizo la kusekondale.
Albertina amaphunzira pamodzi ndi mnzake, Betty.
Albertina anapeza malikisi onse pamayeso. Anapambana! Koma anali wamkulu kuposa anzake amkalasi chifukwa anaphonya nthawi yambiri yasukulu, kotero iwo anapereka mwayiwo kwa wina.
“Chimenecho si chilungamo,” anaganiza motero Betty.

Aphunzitsi a Albertina analembera kalata nyuzipepala kuti ifotokoze za nkhaniyi. Mwamwayi, wansembe wina anaiwona nkhaniyi ndipo anathandiza kuti Albertina apite kusukulu yapamwamba. Mudzi wakwawo unasangalala kwambiri ndipo unakonza phwando lalikulu!
Albertina anatsazikana ndi banja lakwawo komanso Shishi hatchi ija. Sukulu yake yatsopano inali ulendo wautali wa pabasi kuchokera kwawo. Albertina amakhala komweko ngakhale nthawi yatchuthi.

Atamaliza maphunziro, Albertina anakhala namwino kuti azipeza ndalama pomwe amapitiriza maphunziro. Anapukwa kunyumba, koma amagwirabe ntchito molimbika. Amagwira ntchito ndi akuluakulu komanso ana. Amawaimbira nyimbo ana. “Limbani mtima, ananu. Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu!”
Albertina amakonda kuganizira kutali komwe wachokera. Anagwira ntchito molimbika pomwe anali kale namwino. Amalimbikira. Panali zambiri zoti akwaniritse!

Tsiku lina, Albertina anapezana ndi munthu wolimba mtima wotchedwa Walter Sisulu. Walter amakhumba ufulu wa dziko la South Africa ndi anthu ake. Albertina ndi Walter anakwatirana ndipo anakhala ndi ana ambiri. Albertina amawayimbira nyimbo. “Limbani mtima, ananu. Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu!”

Walter anamenya nkhondo ya South Africa watsopano molimba mtima. Izi zinamuika m’mavuto kwa apolisi, ndipo anamangidwa. Pamene apolisi anabwera kudzamutengera kundende, Albertina anawalalatira chifukwa choponda maluwa ake!
Albertina anaikidwapo m’ndende nthawi zochuluka, koma anapitirizabe kukonza ziwonetsero. Ngati ali ndi mantha kapena kusungulumwa, amayimba nyimbo. “Limba mtima, mwanawe. Limodzi tili ndi mphamvu!”
Albertina Sisulu anakhala moyo wautali. Analimbikitsa kukhala ndi moyo wabwino. Amakondedwa, ndipo amatchedwa Ma Sisulu ndi anthu a ku South Africa.
